item.title: First reading, referred to Labor & Commerce.

item.title: 👎Rebecca Faust - Teamsters Local 313
item.description: Rebecca Faust signed up to testify Con.

item.title: 👍Elizabeth Duran - Washington State Office of Public Defense
item.description: Elizabeth Duran signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👍Rachel Ybarra - Washington State Office of Public Defense
item.description: Rachel Ybarra signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👍Kian Alden - Teamsters
item.description: Kian Alden signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Teamsters.

item.title: 👍Friday Sodorff - Teamsters
item.description: Friday Sodorff signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👍Kiah Penfield - Teamsters
item.description: Kiah Penfield signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👎💵James King - Independent Business Association
item.description: James King signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Independent Business Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍April Sims - Washington State Labor Council, AFL-CIO
item.description: April Sims signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Labor Council, AFL-CIO.

item.title: 👎Bob Battles - Association of Washington Business (AWB)
item.description: Bob Battles signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Business (AWB).

item.title: 👍Brett Botts - Teamsters Local 313
item.description: Brett Botts signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Teamsters Local 313.

item.title: ❓💵Taylor Gardner - WA Assn of Sheriffs and Police Chiefs
item.description: Taylor Gardner signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent WA Assn of Sheriffs and Police Chiefs. They are a registered lobbyist.
